sentence.Network_en: They usually write poetry in heroic couplets , a polished iambic pentameter line.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们通常以英雄双行体创作诗歌, 这是一种经过推敲的五步抑扬格诗行.

sentence.Network_en: A couplet written in iambic pentameter is called a heroic couplet.
sentence.Network_cn: 五步抑扬格的双韵体称英雄双韵体.

sentence.Network_en: In English, the meter most commonly used with blank verse has been iambic pentameter.
sentence.Network_cn: 英语中, 无韵诗最常用的格律是抑扬格五音步(因此无韵诗又被称为无韵五节拍诗).

一个轻重就是一个foot(音步),每行十个音节,五个轻重,就是五音步(pentameter),一个轻音和一个重音构成一个音步,叫抑扬格(iamb)。
？韵（rhyme）_huahua_百度空间 ... 4. tetrameter 四音部诗行 5. pentameter 五步格诗 7.heptameter 七韵步的诗.
每行五个音步(pentameter)，每个音步有两个音节，采用轻音+重音的抑扬格(imabus)的格律形式，诗尾的押韵方式为aabb型。英语诗 …

list.abs: 此诗的基本音步类型是抑扬格，每行五音步。因此称此诗的格律是“抑扬格五音步”（iambic pentameter）。一首诗的音步类型和所含的音步数目构成此诗的格律（meter）。
这诗体是以ababbcbc为韵式的九行诗体，上八行都是五音步，也多为抑扬格(iambic pentameter)，只有最后一行为六音步。这最后一 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek pentametros (see penta-, -meter)

entry.def: In literary criticism, a pentameter is a line of poetry that has five strong beats in it.

means.word_mean: 1. a verse line having five metrical feet

auth_sentence.content: His whole theory about pentameter "rests" on the idea of a sixth foot, a rest in the musical sense.
